greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Completely multiplicative with a(p) = A002487(p).
comment: Provided that the conjecture given in A261179 holds, then for all n >= 1, A007814(a(n)) = A007949(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to Stern's sequences
program: A318509(n) = { my(f=factor(n)); for (i=1, #f~, f[i, 1] = A002487(f[i, 1])); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 30 2018
